attributes.action: Bring an end to the weekly farce that is PMQs
attributes.additional_details: PMs question time is a weekly schoolboy farce showing the UK Parliament at its very worst. The party leaders hate it and it is frankly insulting to the UK electorate. Do away with it as soon as possible and replace it with something valuable like question submitted by constituents

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
